lines.text: We are not thugs. We want peace too, but we are impatient.
Get over it, this is war.
Don't you know only humans can feel shame?
I came to laugh at you.
The only thing we're good for is killing others.
The proof of our might will forever be etched in your minds.
They're just a couple licking each others wounds.
I am, and always have been, my own man.
Why must we fight amongst each other and further pollute the earth?
I won't die alone, I'm taking your soul with me.
Monster! So many have died today!
No need to cry, you'll be joining them soon.

How dare you enjoy this? Lives are power... lives are the power that sustains the universe! To just waste them! To throw away lives without a second thought! Why does fighting give you so much pleasure? Your nothing but an animal, you don't deserve to live!
